title.rendered: Digiperform in News: Watch Digiperform in Business Standard, ANI, Mid-Day etc.

content.rendered:
“Upskilling is the new mantra to climb the

Corporate Ladder“

The prominent online publications like Business Standard, MidDay, ANI, AI etc. have featured Digiperform in an article “Upskilling is the new mantra to climb the corporate ladder: How Digiperform is helping working professionals to brush up their skills”, on 13th April.

The publications highlighted 4 platforms that help working professionals to upgrade their skills in Digital marketing, Big data, Finance, Blockchain technology etc.

Coverage Details:

Publications: Business Standard, Mid-Day, ANI & AI.

Date:13th April 2018

Edition: Online

Online links:

Business Standard: http://www.business-standard.com/article/news-ani/here-are-4-platforms-for-working-professionals-to-brush-up-their-skills-118041300783_1.html Mid-Day: https://www.mid-day.com/articles/these-four-platforms-will-help-for-working-professionals-brush-up-their-skills/19316175 ANI: https://www.aninews.in/news/tech/others/here-are-4-platforms-for-working-professionals-to-brush-up-their-skills201804131640300002/ AI: http://into.ai/blog/news-stories/here-are-4-platforms-for-working-professionals-to-brush-up-their-skills/
